using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Threading.Tasks;
using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc;
using Microsoft.Extensions.Logging;
using Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore;
using Microsoft.AspNetCore.Authorization;
using Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.ChangeTracking;

namespace UsersWithFriends.Services
{
    public interface IUsersPetsService
    {
        User CurrentUser { get; set; }
        ServiceResponse<List<Pet>> GetPets(int userId);
        ServiceResponse<Pet> GetPet(int userId, int petId);
        ServiceResponse<Pet> AddPet(int userId, Pet pet);
        ServiceResponse<Pet> UpdatePet(int userId, int petId, Pet pet);
        ServiceResponse DeletePet(int userId, int petId);
    }
}
